title: Directive Coup & Revelation
outcome: The Directorate seizes full control after coordinated disappearances of prominent ghosts. Martial law is declared; CCTVs mark every movement, and mass scoring errors deepen resentment. Lenart Kova secretly sabotages key BCI nodes. The disruption releases logs showing that many ghost erasures were sanctioned at Halden’s own request. Public outrage boils—Oksana Lintz resurfaces with evidence of Halden’s self-orchestrated demise meant to force a crisis, and a wave of unrest threatens total system collapse.

events.description: The Directorate executes a coordinated sweep, detaining ghost leaders and imposing severe citywide movement restrictions.
Martial law is declared. Every citizen faces increased surveillance and BCI scoring errors, fueling widespread but suppressed dissatisfaction.
Lenart Kova stealthily disables critical BCI routines, causing system-wide scoring chaos. Hidden logs are exposed to select Council members.
Evidence surfaces that Halden personally sanctioned many ghost erasures. Oksana Lintz reveals proof that Halden’s death was planned to provoke a system crisis.
Public outrage spikes as news of Halden’s direct culpability spreads, leading to mass rallies and intense demands for leadership overhaul or BCI shutdown.
